For those who cannot get it working:

--------------------------------------------------------

1- Extract Postal.3.Retail [English] AND Postal 3 keygen [backup].

2- Go into the folder you extracted the GAME to.

3- Mount POSTAL3_mini to a virtual drive.

4- Open p3.exe.

5- Go into the folder you extracted the KEYGEN to.

6- Open keygen.exe.

7- Copy the serial the KEYGEN gives you into the Postal 3 set up.

8- Click on the first highlighted word under the serial.

9- This should open another window, copy the second set of numbers/letters and paste it into the HwId section of the KEYGEN.

10- Click Gen Key.

11- Copy the Key it gives you from the KEYGEN into the last line of the Postal 3 window.

12- Click the top right button on the Postal 3 window.
